lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court has rejected a motion to modify an amnesty law so that officials accused of human-rights abuses under Brazil’s military dictatorship would have to stand trial.
snippet: The Supreme Court has rejected a motion to modify an amnesty law so that officials accused of human-rights abuses under Brazil’s military dictatorship would have to stand trial.

headline.main: Brazil: No Change to Amnesty Law
headline.print_headline: Brazil: No Change To Amnesty Law
